meeting-1.title: AI Generative Study Team Meeting
meeting-1.summary: Roxanne Tanenbaum asked the panelists about their biggest challenges and frustrations in user research. Sam struggled with getting users to open up, while Amy discussed the difficulties of conducting research in a remote setting.
